messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 835
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/19/00 7:32:06 AM Eastern Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/19/00 7:32:06 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com writes:

<< hey couldn't have used me for any show on negatives of extended nursing.
My first two weaned themselves by age 2 this latest is still nursing to take
naps or before going to bed at 2 3/4. >>

Was that 20/20 or 60 minutes or something? Those shows are so inflammatory
sometimes. I don't know how, but they manage to take something so common
sense and make it controversial. I wish they would go away and stop inciting
suspicion against natural living.

BTW, lots of extended nursing in our house too. My son is 3 and almost 2
months and still nurses to nap and sleep. It has really cut down since last
year at this time. He is a spirited/high need child, and the nursing has
really helped him to have a secure base. And helped me calm him down of
course!

cath
